name: Nightmare Defender
description:
Having trouble running the game? Don't worry, there are downloadable versions below!

A submission to the Jame Gam! (No that's not a typo!)

Have you ever wondered to yourself 'what if the monster under my bed was actually real and they defended against big spooky guys who cause people to have nightmares using human-made firearms?' No? You haven't? Huh.

Well this game answers it anyways! In Nightmare Defender, you play as the monster under the bed and you have to ward off nightmares using your trusty pistol! Beware, however - your enemies are armed too!

Killing an enemy may give you a card to use for a short boost! Use them wisely!

How long can you survive?

Controls:

Move: W/A/S/D (Arrow keys work too, but aren't recommended)

Aim: Move your mouse!

Shoot: Left mouse button

Activate Card: E

Discard Card: Q

Music provided by OpenGameArt.Org and composed by SubspaceAudio:

https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action
